```css
// Property: transition
// Component(s): Ti.UI.Animation
'.transition-animation-style-curl-down[platform=ios]': { transition: Ti.UI.iOS.AnimationStyle.CURL_DOWN }
'.transition-animation-style-curl-up[platform=ios]': { transition: Ti.UI.iOS.AnimationStyle.CURL_UP }
'.transition-animation-style-flip-from-left[platform=ios]': { transition: Ti.UI.iOS.AnimationStyle.FLIP_FROM_LEFT }
'.transition-animation-style-flip-from-right[platform=ios]': { transition: Ti.UI.iOS.AnimationStyle.FLIP_FROM_RIGHT }
'.transition-animation-style-flip-from-top[platform=ios]': { transition: Ti.UI.iOS.AnimationStyle.FLIP_FROM_TOP }
'.transition-animation-style-flip-from-bottom[platform=ios]': { transition: Ti.UI.iOS.AnimationStyle.FLIP_FROM_BOTTOM }
'.transition-animation-style-cross-dissolve[platform=ios]': { transition: Ti.UI.iOS.AnimationStyle.CROSS_DISSOLVE }
'.transition-animation-style-none[platform=ios]': { transition: Ti.UI.iOS.AnimationStyle.NONE }
```
